channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Nothing’s CMF Phone Pro 2 Is A New Departure
item.description: A new budget phone has arrived from Nothing, with 3 rear cameras in a slim and light design.

item.title: Giant Glowing Object Found Close To Solar System — What To Know
item.description: Scientists have unveiled an enormous gas cloud just 300 light-years from the solar system that measures about full 40 moons across the sky.

item.title: The 100% Scored Netflix Show Not Enough People Are Watching
item.description: A new show on Netflix has perfect 100% critic scores, but the numbers indicate that not enough people are watching the series.
